div.p: Codes identifying the types of relationships between two plans.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/care-plan-relationship defines the following codes:

tr.td: The referenced plan is considered to be part of this plan.
This plan takes the places of the referenced plan.
This plan provides details about how to perform activities defined at a higher level by the referenced plan.

description.value: Codes identifying the types of relationships between two plans.

definition.value: The referenced plan is considered to be part of this plan.
This plan takes the places of the referenced plan.
This plan provides details about how to perform activities defined at a higher level by the referenced plan.
